author: ETA PRIME
description:
We’ve constructed a compact gaming PC using AMD’s most powerful iGPU, capable of running a wide range of applications, including AAA games and LLMs. In this video, we showcase the process of building a custom mini gaming PC using the new Framework Mainboard, powered by the AMD Ryzen AI MAX+ 395 processor, equipped with 128GB of RAM, and featuring the Radeon 8060S iGPU. This compact form factor delivers exceptional performance. #MiniPC #GamingPC #AMD #Ryzen #PCBuild #Tech #LLM #AIPC #Framework #SmallFormFactor
